title: REQUESTING THE UNIVERSITY OF HAWAII SYSTEM TO ESTABLISH A VETERINARY MEDICINE EXPANSION WORKING GROUP TO EXPLORE THE FEASIBILITY OF DEVELOPING A DOCTOR OF VETERINARY MEDICINE PROGRAM.
subject: Doctor of Veterinary Medicine
Report
UH
Windward Community College
Working Group

actions.description: Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 831).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 753).
Transmitted to Senate.
Adopted with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Pierick voting no (1) and  Representative(s) Cochran, Todd excused (2).
Reported from AGR (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2121), recommending adoption.

The committee on AGR recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Kahaloa, Kusch, Lowen, Perruso; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Quinlan.
Resolution scheduled to be heard by AGR on Tuesday, 04-15-25 10:00AM in conference room 430 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on AGR as amended in HD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Pierick voting no (1) and Representative(s) Cochran, Garcia, Matayoshi excused (3).
Reported from HED (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2047) as amended in HD 1, recommending referral to AGR.

The committee on HED recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Garrett, Kapela, Kila, La Chica, Olds, Sayama, Muraoka; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Amato, Evslin, Woodson, Souza.
Resolution scheduled to be heard by HED on Wednesday, 04-09-25 2:00PM in conference room 309 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
Referred to HED, AGR, referral sheet 28
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 442).
Report and Resolution Adopted.  Transmitted to House.
One Day Notice 04-01-25.
Reported from HRE (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1373) with recommendation of adoption.

The committee(s) on HRE recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED.  The votes in HRE were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Kim, Kidani, Hashimoto; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Fukunaga, Fevella.
The committee(s) on HRE has scheduled a public hearing on 03-20-25 3:01PM; Conference Room 229 & Videoconference.
Referred to HRE.
Offered.
